name: Prodigy Wireless Earbuds
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear sound quality. Perfect for commuters and music lovers.

name: TechCharge USB-C Cable
description: Durable 6-foot USB-C fast charging cable with braided design. Supports data transfer and quick charging for all your devices.

name: PowerBank Pro 10000mAh
description: Compact 10000mAh portable charger with wireless charging pad and dual USB ports. Charges phones, tablets, and wireless devices on the go.

name: SmartWatch Sport Edition
description: Fitness-focused smartwatch with heart rate monitor, GPS tracking, and 7-day battery life. Water-resistant design for workouts and daily wear.

name: Fitness Tracker Band
description: Lightweight activity tracker with sleep monitoring, step counter, and smartphone notifications. Comfortable silicone band for 24/7 wear.

name: Premium Yoga Mat Pro
description: Eco-friendly yoga mat with superior grip, extra cushioning, and alignment guides. Non-slip surface perfect for all yoga styles and workouts.

name: Resistance Bands Complete Set
description: 5-piece resistance band set with varying resistance levels. Includes door anchor, handles, and exercise guide for full-body workouts at home.

name: Ergo Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse designed for comfort during long work sessions. Precision tracking, 2-year battery life, and multi-device connectivity.

name: Slim Wireless Keyboard
description: Ultra-thin wireless keyboard with mechanical-style keys and backlit design. Compatible with Windows, Mac, and tablets. Sleek aluminum finish.

name: Adjustable Laptop Stand
description: Aluminum laptop stand with 9 height adjustments and 360-degree rotation. Ergonomic design improves posture and cooling. Fits laptops up to 17 inches.

name: Premium Earbud Case
description: Hard-shell protective case with carabiner clip for earbuds. Compact design with interior mesh pocket for accessories.
